sub_title: MSc Management of Innovation | BSc IBA | Innovation Management | Management Consulting | Spanish Learner
summary:
I am driven by making transitions possible. Because of my background in innovationmanagement and change mangement I have a broad perspective on transition challenges. 

I can serve as a brainstorm partner regarding financing diverse complex innovation and development questions from a creative point of view.

profile_positions.description:
● Quooker, the founder of the boiling water tap, is a highly innovative company that created its own industry. It started as a family business and is currently operating in 13 countries. 

● Position: Future Business Development Team -  Interdisciplinar project management team work with departments such as Marketing, Supply Chain, HR, and R&D. E.g. Visualizing the online customer journey, Product package optimization, Market research, Recruitment, Internal researches, and many more. 

● Own project regarding brainstorming about the innovation strategy with R&D. Here I have the opportunity to take an advising role when implementing the theory of my master MSc Management of Innovation.
profile_positions.title: Future Business Development Team

profile_positions.description:
● Global entrepreneurship project at a start-up in Lima Peru
● Main function: Digital Marketing to generate customer awareness
● Customer acquisition and business development of a new restaurant San Isidro.
● Developing the organization with tools to scale-up
● Spanish and intercultural communication

● Solo backpacking in Peru afterward

volunteer_experiences.description:
● As a member of RCC, I represented Erasmus University in an international consulting contest (IXL Innovation Olympics)
● Part of this membership was taking part in several consulting-related workshops and trainings

● Selected youth representative to brainstorm about solutions regarding urbanization and mobility in the Netherlands. 
● Initiated creating a brainstorming framework to structure ideas using design thinking

● CELID is an organization of university students in Peru who are aiming for change through leadership development. 
● I am taking part as a guest speaker to talk about how innovation is done in the Netherlands and the projects I am engaged in
